articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with  a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Congratulations to Turkmen President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Turkmen President
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on February 14 sent a congratulatory message to Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov on his reelection as president of Turkmenistan.
					 Believing that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Turkmenistan would grow stronger in line with the common interests and desire of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the Turkmen president success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to German President
articles.content:
Congratulations to German President
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Feb. 13 sent a congratulatory message to Frank-Walter Steinmeier upon his election as president of Germany.
					 Hoping that the bilateral relations would develop in the common interests of the two peoples, the message wished the German president success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans in China who are participating in the 21st Kimjongilia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bouquets before the President's old home in Mangyongdae with boundless reverence for him.
					
					 They looked round historic relics preserved with care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the peerlessly great man and his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They had photos taken before the President's old home.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Sinister Aim Sought by S. Korean Conservative Group's Party Name Change
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Sinister Aim Sought by S. Korean Conservative Group's Party Name Change
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the group of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea staged the farce of changing its name into "Free Korea Party" and revising its programme and logo.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a chicanery intended to discard its ill-fame as the "private party of Park Geun Hye" and cover up truth about the treacherous politics and irregularities and corruption pursued at her beck and call.
					
					 It is the trite method employed by the puppet conservative group to change their party name whenever they faced a crisis.
					
					 No matter how frequently they may change their signboard and shift their party building to another place, they can never alter their true colors as the party involved in traitor Park's acts of treachery and scandals, a group of wicked political charlatans and a party of traitors without an equal.
					
					 No sooner had the conservative group changed their party name than got more desperate in their moves to pressurize the "constitutional court" to dismiss the impeachment trial, while undisguisedly shielding Chongwadae's  evil woman. This, however, only goes to clearly prove that they are the same hordes of hateful quislings as Park.
					
					 It is quite natural that people of various circles in south Korea are spitting at the puppet conservative group's party name change.
					
					 The reality shows that the group's above-said farce can not help them escape from their miserable fate.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday devotes an article to the 43rd anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism."
					 It deals with the feats performed by him for modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 One of his noble feats performed for modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea is that he formulated the revolutionary ideology of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and made it shine as an everlasting guiding ideology in the era of independence.
					
					 He wisely led the struggle to model the whole society on Kimilsungism after comprehensively reviewing the 100 year-long  history of ideology of the working class in his early years and proving that the President's revolutionary ideology is the only guiding ideology to lead the popular masses' cause of independence to victory. 
					
					 He developed in depth the President's idea of prioritizing arms into the revolutionary idea of Songun and political theory of Songun and put forward the theory of building a powerful socialist country, thus remarkably enhancing the magnetic power and vitality of Kimilsungism.
					
					 He strengthened and developed the revolutionary ranks into an ideological pure entity and organism based on unbreakable unity. Herein lies his another undying feat.
					
					 The rock-firm unity of the revolutionary ranks in thought and purpose achieved through the gigantic struggle to model the whole society on Kimilsungism provides a sure guarantee for advancing the Korean revolution along the road of victory.
					
					 The above-said noble feats lie in that he fully met the requirements of Kimilsungism in all fields of the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Russia
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Further Strengthen Our Single-Hearted Unity and Give Full Play to the Korean-Nation-First Spirit" was posted on the Russian website Irkutskblogspot. ru on February 9 on the occasion of the Day of the Shinning Star, his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on February 4, Juche 81 (1992), calls for consistently and dynamically pushing forward the work to further glorify Korean-style socialism with the might of the single-hearted unity.
					
					 It also deals with the tasks and ways for giving full play to the Korean-nation-first spirit, Koryo-nation-first spirit.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Indonesian Figure
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- HE Kim Jong Il is the great leader who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					 Koko Jatmiko, manager of the Hekadaha Adicitra Publishing House of Indonesia, said this at the ceremony of releasing respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" held on Feb. 10. 
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist political and ideological power and military power with his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership at the end of the last century when the imperialists had gone to extremes in their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He pointed out that the Korean people are waging a dynamic drive for fulfilling the behests of HE Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its might as a nuclear power in the East, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A meeting was held in DR Congo, reading session about Kim Jong Il's work in Romania and seminar on his exploits in Ethiopia from Jan. 26 to Feb. 1.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos on the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Jong Il and other Korean books, and photos introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo and chairman of the preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il is the great successor to the cause of the Juche revolution started by Kim Il Sung, and prominent thinker and theoretician.
					
					 The feats Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the times and history will always be remembered by mankind, he added.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania and chairman of the Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was made public at the times when the world socialist movement was suffering difficulties.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his work dealt a heavy blow at the imperialists and renegades of socialism who talked about "complete end of socialism", and proved scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and the necessity of its victory.
					
					 Scientific accuracy and truth of socialism are clearly proved by the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The reporter and speakers at the seminar held in Ethiopia praised the ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Hekadaha Adicitra Publishing House of Indonesia brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on Feb. 10.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China celebrated the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the events were Chairwoman of the Association Choe Un Bok, its officials, representatives of affiliated associations, members of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China and the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China, Koreans in Shenyang, the DPRK consul general and officials of the consulate general in Shenyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the head of the veteran lecturers' group of the Chinese People's Volunteers, compatriots in various circles and personages in Liaoning Province and Shenyang City.
					
					 A meeting of the General Association of Koreans in China to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star was held in Shenyang, China on Feb. 15.
					
					 Choe Un Bok said that the life of Kim Jong Il was a noble life of a peerless patriot who devoted his all to the country and its people only.
					
					 She called on the Association and Koreans in China to make all efforts for the prosperity of the country and accelerate the advance for opening a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched a Korean film showing Kim Jong Un providing energetic leadership over the work for bringing a bountiful and happy life to the people.
					
					 Then followed an art performance and a reception.
					
					 A photo and book exhibition took place on Feb. 14.
					
					 The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association on Feb. 12 held a seminar on the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for national reunification and the overseas compatriots movement.

articles.title: Joint Bulletin "Birth of Kimjongilia" Issued in Guinea
articles.content:
Joint Bulletin "Birth of Kimjongilia" Issued in Guinea
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea released a joint bulletin "Birth of Kimjongilia" on Feb. 8 on the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin introduced the background against which immortal flower Kimjongilia was bred as the most famous flower of the world in reflection of reverence of all peoples for the peerlessly great man, and its features.
					
					 The meaning and value of Kimjongilia lie in that it fully represents the personality of Kim Jong Il as the great man, the bulletin said, adding: Kimjongilia is, indeed, the flower named after the great man in every aspect such as its color, leaves and stem.

articles.title: Appeal of Joint Conference of DPRK Supported by UK Bodies
articles.content:
Appeal of Joint Conference of DPRK Supported by UK Bodies
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Korean Friendship Association UK and the British preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu made public a joint statement on Jan. 21 in support of the appeal adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement said respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address indicated clear and realistic ways of achieving the reunification of Korea.
					
					 It reflects the noble patriotic intention of Kim Jong Un working heart and soul to achieve the independent reunification of the country, the statement noted.
					
					 This year marks the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, it said, and went on: 
					
					 In this regard, the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations adopted an appeal to the whole Korean nation.
					
					 We fully support this appeal.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for blocking the way of reunifying Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should stop the anti-DPRK war drills. 
					
					 The implementation of the appeal will help make a signal breakthrough in the drive for the reunification of Korea and it will make a positive contribution to the global peace.
